title: Central Stadium (Astrakhan)
text:
Central Stadium (, "Tsentralnyi Stadion") is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Astrakhan">Astrakhan</a>, <a href="Russia">Russia</a>. It is used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home stadium of <a href="FC%20Volgar%20Astrakhan">Volgar Astrakhan</a>. The stadium holds 21,500 people, all seated.
The venue hosted <a href="2015%20Russian%20Cup%20Final">2015 Russian Cup Final</a> between <a href="FC%20Lokomotiv%20Moscow">Lokomotiv Moscow</a> and <a href="FC%20Kuban%20Krasnodar">Kuban Krasnodar</a>. This was the first time Central Stadium had been chosen to host Russian Cup final.
